runInBackground.label: Run in background when closed
runInBackground.description: Keep app running in system tray when window is closed

rememberLastPage.label: Remember last page
rememberLastPage.description: Restore last viewed page when switching between Gemini and AI Studio

screenshotButton.label: Show screenshot button
screenshotButton.description: Long code blocks may not capture properly.

clearCache.title: Clear Cache
clearCache.message:
Are you sure you want to clear the cache?

This will delete all app data including login information.
Your Gemini and AI Studio history is automatically saved on the web.

resetAll.title: Reset All Settings
resetAll.message:
Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?

• Hotkey: Shift+Z
• Language: System Default
• Always on top: On
• Start with Windows: On

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChanges.message:
You have unsaved changes.
Close without saving?

languageChange.title: Restart Required
languageChange.message: The app needs to restart to apply the language change.
